datafield.subfield: Plans, elevations, sections &c.: shewing the results of the excavations at Jerusalem, 1867-70.
The survey of Western Palestine : Jerusalem.
Committee of the Palestine Exploration Fund,

The atlas to The Survey of Western Palestine: Jerusalem, 1884, by Col. Sir Charles Warren and Capt. Claude Reignier Conder. Contains 49 detailed plans and illustrations of Jerusalem which have been linen-backed. The only two maps in the atlas form plates 48 and 49.

Plate 1. Title--Plates 2-3. Plan of Jerusalem showing Rock Contours--Plates 4-5. Masjed Al Aksa, or Haram Ash Sharif...excavations--Plates 6-7. Haram Ash Sharif (the Noble Sanctuary), shewing rock contours--Plates 8-9. Sections on plates II and III--Plates 10-11-12. Sections on plates IV and V--Plate 13. Elevation of North-East Angle 1:120--Plate 14. Elevation of Wall of Noble Sanctuary 1:60--Plate 15. Sections... Wall of Noble Sanctuary at North-East Angle--Plate 16. Birket Israil--Plate 17. Details near North-East Angle, Noble Sanctuary--Plate 18. Details... at South-East Angle--Plate 19. Elevation of East Wall, South-East Angle--Plate 20. Elevation, South-East Angle, South side 1:120--Plate 21-22-23. Painted Marks on East Wall, full size--Plate 24. Single Gate and Ophel Wall--Plate 25. The Triple Gate and Double Tunnel--Plate 26. Elevation of South Front--Plate 27. South-West Angle, South Front--Plate 28. Elevation of Robinson's Arch, South-West Angle, West Side--Plate 29. Plan of Portion of Arcade Excavation [Robinson's Arch]-

Plate 30. Plan of Aqueduct [Robinson's Arch]--Plate 31. Plan and Section...Passage at Barclay's Gate--Plate 32. Elevation... of Barclay's Gate--Plate 33. Section through Causeway Vaults and Wilson's Arch--Plate 34. Section and Elevation of Vaults... West Wall at Causeway--Plate 35. Plan of Secret Passage in Causeway--Plate 36. Plan of Great Causeway--Plate 37. The Twin Tunnel near North-West Angle--Plate 38. Details South-West Angle, Noble Sanctuary--Plate 39. Researches inside the Noble Sanctuary--Plate 40. The Wall of Ophel 1:120--Plate 41. Excavations at the Bishops School [Details about the City]--Plate 42. Acqueduct, Virgin's Fountain--Plate 43. Passage, Virgin's Fountain [and other details]--Plate 45-46-47. Pottery found in Excavations--Plate 48. Reconnaissance Jordan Valley--Plate 49. Reconnaissance of the Plain of Philistia--Plate 50. Plan and sections of the Muristan (by Captain Conder, R.E.).
The Albright library also has a facsimile edition, 1998, DS102.P18 Vol.4.
Reconnaissance of the Jordan Valley, pl. 48; Reconnaissance of the Plain of Philistia, pl. 49.
